description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**FRESHMAN ENGLISH**

                          **Autumn, 2018**

**INSTRUCTOR**        Ruei-fang, Shiang (Joyce)

**Course Description**

This course aims to develop student’s English proficiency regarding all 4 language skills. Students are expected to increase their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension and communication competence through a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

**Textbook**

**_School- Assigned:_**

Dummet, P. Stephenson, H. & Lansford, L. (2017). _Keynote 3.  National Geographic  Learning._

**_Optional, Discipline-related_**: online resources

**Requirements and Rules**

1\. Class attendance, lesson preparation and active class participation are required.

\[\*I’ll take attendance throughout this semester. If you **miss the call for more than 2 times, you’ll definitely be flunked**. Being late for over 30 minutes is treated as absence for the class that day. If you are absent in case of uncontrollable situations (e.g. illness, emergency, etc.), be sure to ask for leaves **within two weeks** and make sure that I receive the email. Besides, you cannot ask for more than **5** leaves for the whole semester according to the school regulations.\]

**2\. Cheating on quizzes or exams** is absolutely forbidden. If someone is found cheating on an exam, he/she will fail that exam.

**3\. Textbook** is a must. Violation of this rule will cost you 3 points (out of your final score) each time.

4\. Every student must use the multimedia lab **樸101** for at lease **5 hours** this semester.

5\. You are not supposed to use your electronic toys such as laptop, iPad, iPod, or smart phone in class. Violation of this rule will cost you 3     points each time.

**6\. Before every meeting**, you are supposed to **preview the vocabulary and the reading**. Quizzes might be given any time to check your attendance & comprehension.

7.  All the English (I) classes have been arranged to take **LEXILE** online reading

   comprehension tests. Please read **LEXILE graded readers** corresponding to

   your current **reading level** before the tests. You can borrow them from

   **NTNU library.**

8.  During this semester, you will be required to do a 3 mins presentation and

   writing in English. The topics of these two assignments will be discussed in

   our first meeting.

Grading Policies

Each student are expected to actively participate in all class activities, group project, etc.. The grading criteria are listed below:

Attendance, participation, and quizzes  15%

Group presentation  16%

Lab visit (at least 5 hours)   5%

Midterm Assignment   10%

Participation 34%

3 mins Presentation     10%

Writing   10%

**Bonus Points**

1.  Extra hours of using lab may help you earn some bonus points. (at most 5)
2.  Excellent oral presentation in correct English will get extra 5 points at most.

        3.  Participation in any activities held by the English Department will get bonus

             points.
